languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, вы воспользовались моим плачевным положением, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}принудили{/d} подняться на корабль под страхом смерти и теперь ждете содействия. Развейте окончательно непроглядную тьму моих сомнений — я пленница на вашем корабле?"

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, вы воспользовались моим плачевным положением, принудили подняться на корабль под страхом смерти и теперь ждете содействия. Развейте окончательно непроглядную тьму моих сомнений — я пленница на вашем корабле?"

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, вы воспользовались моим плачевным положением, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}принудили{/d} подняться на корабль под страхом смерти и теперь ждете содействия. Развейте окончательно непроглядную тьму моих сомнений — я пленница на вашем корабле?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, forced me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

"Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, forced me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

"Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, forced me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

"Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, forced me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

languages.text: “行商浪人，你利用了我悲惨的境遇，趁机{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}逼迫{/d}我在死亡的恐惧下登上了你的船。现在你站在我面前，希望我能与你合作。请你彻底驱散我心中那些阴暗的迷雾吧——我是这艘虚空舰上的囚徒吗？”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，你利用了我悲惨的境遇，趁机逼迫我在死亡的恐惧下登上了你的船。现在你站在我面前，希望我能与你合作。请你彻底驱散我心中那些阴暗的迷雾吧——我是这艘虚空舰上的囚徒吗？”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者はあたくしの哀れな立場を利用し、死の恐怖の中、ご自身の船に乗ることを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}強要{/d}なされました、そして今あたくしの協力を期待してそこにお立ちになっておられる。どうか、あたくしの心の中にある迷いの霧を晴らしてくださいませ。あたくしはこの船の囚人なのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、あなたは私の哀れな立場を利用し、死の恐怖の中、あなたの船に乗ることを強要しました、そして今あなたは私の協力を期待してそこに立っています。どうか、私の心の中にある迷いの霧を晴らしていただきたい。私はこの船の囚人なのですか？」
「自由開拓者はあたくしの哀れな立場を利用し、死の恐怖の中、ご自身の船に乗ることを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}強要{/d}なされました、そして今あたくしの協力を期待してそこにお立ちになっておられる。どうか、あたくしの心の中にある迷いの霧を晴らしてくださいませ。あたくしはこの船の囚人なのですか？」

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, Ihr habt meine missliche Lage ausgenutzt, mich unter Todesangst an Bord Eures Schiffs {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}gezwungen{/d} und erwartet nun meine Kooperation. Bitte zerstreut ein für alle Mal den dichten Nebel des Zweifels in meinem Geist – bin ich auf diesem Raumschiff eine Gefangene?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, Ihr habt meine missliche Lage ausgenutzt, mich unter Todesangst an Bord Eures Schiffs gezwungen und erwartet nun meine Kooperation. Bitte zerstreut ein für alle Mal den dichten Nebel des Zweifels in meinem Geist – bin ich auf diesem Raumschiff eine Gefangene?"

languages.text: « {Mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, vous avez profité de ma situation désespérée et de ma peur de la mort pour me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forcer{/d} à monter à bord et vous voilà à présent, à attendre ma coopération. Je vous en prie, dissipez une bonne fois pour toutes les doutes qui assaillent mon esprit... suis-je prisonnière de ce vaisseau spatial ? »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, vous avez profité de ma situation désespérée et de ma peur de la mort pour me forcer à monter à bord et vous voilà à présent, à attendre ma coopération. Je vous en prie, dissipez une bonne fois pour toutes les doutes qui assaillent mon esprit... suis-je prisonnière de ce vaisseau spatial? »

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, se ha aprovechado de mi lamentable posición, me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obligó{/d} a subir a su nave para no morir y ahora espera que coopere. Por favor, disipe de una vez la duda que nubla mi mente: ¿soy prisionera en esta nave del vacío?».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, se ha aprovechado de mi lamentable posición, me obligó a subir a su nave para no morir y ahora espera que coopere. Por favor, disipe de una vez la duda que nubla mi mente: ¿soy prisionera en esta nave del vacío?».

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, âciz hâlimden faydalandın, ölüm korkusuyla beni gemine binmeye {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}zorladın{/d} ve şimdi de karşımda durmuş seninle iş birliği yapmamı bekliyorsun. Lütfen zihnimdeki kasvetli şüphe sisinin kati suretle dağılmasını sağla: Bu uçsuz gemisinde esir mi tutuluyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, you took advantage of my wretched position, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}forced{/d} me to board your vessel under fear of death, and now you stand there, expecting my cooperation. Please dispel once and for all the tenebrous fog of doubt in my mind — I am a prisoner on this voidship?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, âciz hâlimden faydalandın, ölüm korkusuyla beni gemine binmeye zorladın ve şimdi de karşımda durmuş seninle iş birliği yapmamı bekliyorsun. Lütfen zihnimdeki kasvetli şüphe sisinin kati suretle dağılmasını sağla: Bu uçsuz gemisinde esir mi tutuluyorum?"
